ROW.name: previous_balance_set_amount
ROW.note: checks previous balances of player and disables those balances equal or less the set amount and not include to the computation of withdraw conditions

ROW.name: non_promo_withdraw_setting
ROW.note: withdraw condition for non promo with bet or no bet

ROW.name: ip_rules
ROW.note: true = use ip list, false = ignore ip list

ROW.name: affiliate_default_terms
ROW.note: affiliate default terms in json format

ROW.name: sub_affiliate_default_terms
ROW.note: sub affiliate default terms in json format

ROW.name: cashback_settings
ROW.note: Cashback Settings Default in json format

ROW.name: affiliate_settings
ROW.note: affiliate set by operator in json format

ROW.name: blocked_game_setting
ROW.note: Blocked Game Settings Default in json format

ROW.name: approve_transfer_to_main
ROW.note: Allow admin user to approve transfer to main

ROW.name: approve_transfer_from_main
ROW.note: Allow admin user to approve transfer from main

ROW.name: cronjob_exec_self_exclusion
ROW.note: Will check for self exclusion request

ROW.name: cronjob_exec_unself_exclusion
ROW.note: Will check for due self exclusion

ROW.name: cronjob_exec_cool_off
ROW.note: Will check for due cool off

ROW.name: cronjob_exec_session_limit_checker
ROW.note: Will check if player reached the playing time period
ROW.description_json: {"type":"checkbox","default_value":true,"label_lang":"Will check if player reached the playing time period"}

ROW.name: cronjob_approve_loss_limit_request
ROW.note: Will approve the loss limit request

ROW.name: cronjob_exec_daily_loss_limit_checker
ROW.note: Will check for active player with loss limit daily
ROW.description_json: {"type":"checkbox","default_value":true,"label_lang":"Will check for active player with loss limit daily"}

ROW.name: cronjob_exec_weekly_loss_limit_checker
ROW.note: Will check for active player with loss limit weekly
ROW.description_json: {"type":"checkbox","default_value":true,"label_lang":"Will check for active player with loss limit weekly"}

ROW.name: cronjob_exec_monthly_loss_limit_checker
ROW.note: Will check for active player with loss limit monthly
ROW.description_json: {"type":"checkbox","default_value":true,"label_lang":"Will check for active player with loss limit monthly"}

ROW.name: cronjob_exec_daily_deposit_limit_checker
ROW.note: Will check for active player with deposit limit daily
ROW.description_json: {"type":"checkbox","default_value":true,"label_lang":"Will check for active player with deposit limit daily"}

ROW.name: cronjob_exec_weekly_deposit_limit_checker
ROW.note: Will check for active player with deposit limit weekly
ROW.description_json: {"type":"checkbox","default_value":true,"label_lang":"Will check for active player with deposit limit weekly"}

ROW.name: cronjob_exec_monthly_deposit_limit_checker
ROW.note: Will check for active player with deposit limit monthly
ROW.description_json: {"type":"checkbox","default_value":true,"label_lang":"Will check for active player with deposit limit monthly"}

ROW.name: cronjob_reset_approved_withdraw_amount
ROW.note: Reset approved withdraw amount daily back to original
ROW.description_json: {"type":"checkbox","default_value":true,"label_lang":"Reset approved withdraw amount daily back to original"}

ROW.name: cronjob_sync_long_total_info
ROW.note: Sync long total day/month/year info last 7 days
ROW.description_json: {"type":"checkbox","default_value":true,"label_lang":"Sync long total day\/month\/year info last 7 days"}

ROW.name: cronjob_clear_small_negative
ROW.note: Clear small negative in wallets daily

ROW.name: cronjob_batch_supplement_run_process_pre_checker_in_queue
ROW.note: Batch supplement execute No trigged processPreCheckers in the queue .
ROW.description_json: {"type":"checkbox","default_value":true,"label_lang":"Batch supplement execute No trigged processPreCheckers in the queue ."}

ROW.name: special_payment_list
ROW.note: Defines which 3rd party payment to appear in the sidebar during withdrawal. Comma separated collection account IDs.

ROW.name: self_exclusion_approval_day_cnt
ROW.note: Number of days will the system approve self exclusion request

ROW.name: cool_off_approval_day_cnt
ROW.note: Number of days will the system approve cool off request

ROW.name: deposit_limit_approval_day_cnt
ROW.note: Number of days will the system approve deposit limit request

ROW.name: loss_limit_approval_day_cnt
ROW.note: Number of days will the system approve loss limit request

ROW.name: automatic_reopen_temp_self_exclusion_account
ROW.note: Automatic reopen the account after Temp Self Exclusion
ROW.description_json: {"type":"radio","default_value":1,"label_lang":"Automatic reopen the account after Temp Self Exclusion"}

ROW.name: player_reactication_day_cnt
ROW.note: Number of days will the system reactivates the player after block in the game and website

ROW.name: country_rules
ROW.note: true = use country list, false = ignore country list

ROW.name: sms_registration_template
ROW.value: 欢迎您加入，请进入 {player_center_url} ，使用用户名 {player_username} 登录

ROW.name: bank_number_validator_mode
ROW.note: only_allow_duplicate_one_player: one player allow duplicate withdrawal and deposit, but can't allow duplicate number in withdrawal or deposit only_allow_duplicate_one_player_any: one player allow duplicate number , no matter withdrawal or deposit not_allow_duplicate_number: don't allow any duplicate bank account number. allow_any_duplicate_number: allow any duplicate bank account number for any player.

ROW.name: realtime_cashback_time_limit
ROW.note: last hours to limit cashback time

ROW.name: email_contact_us_template
ROW.template:
Subject: [subject]
From: [name]
Email: [email]

[message]

ROW.name: player_center_logout_action
ROW.note: Player Center logout after the redirect page

ROW.name: player_center_mobile_header_title_style
self_exclusion_cooling_off_day_cnt
ROW.note: Number of days will the system add cooling off after temporary self exclusion expired

ROW.name: use_smtp_api
ROW.note: true = use SMTP API, false = use default SMTP SETTINGS

ROW.name: player_center_notification_check_interval
ROW.note: Check interval of Player Center Notification

ROW.name: player_center_notification_source_type
ROW.note: notify source type of Player Center Notification

ROW.name: player_login_failed_attempt_reset_timeout
ROW.note: Player login failed attempt reset timeout

ROW.name: limit_of_single_ip_registrations_per_day
ROW.note: Maximum number of single IP registrations per day

ROW.name: financial_account_require_deposit_bank_account
ROW.note: Require player to bind financial account before deposit

ROW.name: financial_account_deposit_account_limit
ROW.note: Maximum number of one player deposit account (checkbox)

ROW.name: financial_account_max_deposit_account_number
ROW.note: Maximum number of one player deposit account (number)

ROW.name: financial_account_can_be_withdraw_and_deposit
ROW.note: Account number can be used in deposit and withdrawal

ROW.name: financial_account_deposit_account_default_unverified
ROW.note: Set Newly Registered Deposit Financial Account to Unverified

ROW.name: financial_account_withdraw_account_limit
ROW.note: Maximum number of one player withdraw account (checkbox)

ROW.name: financial_account_max_withdraw_account_number
ROW.note: Maximum number of one player withdraw account (number)

ROW.name: financial_account_allow_edit
ROW.note: Allow players to edit account info after saving

ROW.name: financial_account_one_account_per_institution
ROW.note: Each financial institution can have only one account

ROW.name: financial_account_allow_delete
ROW.note: Allow players to delete financial account

ROW.name: financial_account_withdraw_account_default_unverified
ROW.note: Set Newly Registered Withdrawal Financial Account to Unverified

ROW.name: financial_account_complete_required_userinfo_before_withdrawal
ROW.note: Require players to complete required user info before withdrawal

ROW.name: show_max_withdrawal_per_transaction
ROW.note: Allow player center withdrawal page show max withdrawal per transaction

ROW.name: show_daily_max_withdrawal_amount
ROW.note: Allow player center withdrawal page show daiply max withdrawal amount

ROW.name: admin_email_template_set_send_lang
ROW.note: admin email template set send language

ROW.name: admin_email_template_set_send_content_mode
ROW.note: admin email template set content mode

ROW.name: admin_sess_expire
ROW.note: auto logout admin sess expire setting

ROW.name: registration_age_limit
ROW.note: admin set user registration age limit

ROW.name: transactions_daily_summary_report_day_starttime
ROW.note: set the time to start the day in searching data

ROW.name: transactions_daily_summary_report_day_endtime
ROW.note: set the time to end the day in searching data

ROW.name: transactions_daily_summary_report_sync_time
ROW.note: set the sync time for daily transaction summary report

ROW.name: player_login_failed_attempt_admin_unlock
ROW.note: Player login failed attempt Admin Manual Unlock

ROW.name: financial_account_deposit_account_limit_type
ROW.note: Maximum number of one player deposit account type (radio)

ROW.name: financial_account_withdraw_account_limit_type
ROW.note: Maximum number of one player withdraw account type (radio)

ROW.name: financial_account_deposit_account_limit_range_conditions
ROW.note: Financial Account Advance Condition Setting Range Conditions for Deposit

ROW.name: financial_account_deposit_account_limit_range_setting_list
ROW.note: Financial Account Advance Condition Setting Range Setting list for Deposit

ROW.name: financial_account_withdraw_account_limit_range_conditions
ROW.note: Financial Account Advance Condition Setting Range Conditions for withdraw

ROW.name: financial_account_withdraw_account_limit_range_setting_list
ROW.note: Financial Account Advance Condition Setting Range Setting list for withdraw

ROW.name: manual_deposit_request_cool_down_time
ROW.note: Manual Deposit Request Cool Down Time

ROW.name: financial_account_require_withdraw_bank_account
ROW.note: Require player to bind withdraw account before deposit

ROW.name: withdrawal_preset_amount
ROW.note: Note : The setting will be applied to all withdrawal bank

ROW.name: casino_navigation_landing_page
ROW.note: Game tag casino navigation landing page

ROW.name: casino_navigation_recent_games_enabled
ROW.note: Check if recent games navigation enabled

ROW.name: casino_navigation_favorite_games_enabled
ROW.note: Check if favorite games navigation enabled
